heading: The importance of Green skills for small and medium-sized enterprises across the EU
subheading: 44% of the interviewed EU-based small and medium-sized companies (SME) see a growing importance of green skills for their company
textNote: Green Skills are skills which are reuqired to green business activities. Fieldwork was conducted via telephone interviews from 4/5 to 24/5/2023, 12 909 interviews were conducted. Representative sample of business was selected.
